tosdr.case: You have the right to leave this service at any time

title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
quoteDoc: Amazon Prime Video Terms of Use
quoteText: If you signed-up for your video-only subscription or membership directly through us, you may cancel any time by visiting Your Account and adjusting your membership settings, by contacting Amazon customer service, or by using any cancellation form that we make available to you on your Video Marketplace (noted here) or, if you transact for the applicable Amazon subscription or membership service through a third party, through your account with such third party.
